mg_thefasterwin_voks created by voks 
the faster player take the weapons :)

New Version - Bug Fixes - 1 New Game
==================

No SourceMod required
------------------



More Spawns
==================
32 T / 32 CT

Games
==================
- New: Time Limit Added (3:30 Minutes)(WAR 4 Minutes)
- New: 7 Colors
- Bhop (You'll need a BHOP plugin! Otherwise it will be too hard)
- Chair Knifing (New Level Added)
- Climb
- Course (1 New Level)
- Dodge Walls
- Elevator (Fixed)
- Falling Boxes (New Config)
- Invisible Man (Fixed)
- Knife (1, 35, 100, 400 HP)
- Last Reaction
- Musical Doors (Fixed)
- Skate 
- Skipping Rope 
- Slide Race (2nd Level harder - 3rd Level A Little Bit Easier)
- Smoke Battle
- Soccer (Winner Team Gets Weapons)
- War -> 7 Different Weapons, 4 Different Maps (Player can choose) - (New: Buyzone)
- Water Climb

Fun
==================
- Player can choose "Low Gravity" for some Games. - Blocked Sometimes (Spam Protection)
- Small Room @ Spawn Where You Can Change Your Skin Color 
- New: 8 Flashbangs Parented To 8 LEGO-Bricks
- Secret Teleport Above The Color-Blocks. If you reach the teleport, you'll get 150 HP.
(Only 1 Player each Round)

Music (Completely New)
==================
- A Skylit Drive - Love The Way You Lie
- Caracilio - Will Be Mine
- Limp Bizkit - Boiler
- Lindsey Stirling - Shadows
- Linkin Park - Castle Of Glass
- Madeon - Pop Culture
- Pendulum - Slam
- Razorback - Tough Luck (Dubstep)
- Seeed - Augenbling
- Three Days Grace - Time Of Dying


### I hope that there are no bugs anymore... But if you find one, please tell me!

It would be nice, if you could send me your server IPs. I'd like to see the map on other servers :)

Here it is!
The final version of my map :)

I did a lot of bugfixes, edited games and so on...

Games:
- Bhop: Easy & Hard -> For "hard" is a bhop plugin required
- Car of Death
- Chair Knifing
- Climb
- Course
- Dodge Walls
- Elevator
- Knife (Ring)
- Knife T vs CT
- Longjump
- Musical Doors
- Skipping Rope
- Smoke Battle
- WAR: 7 different weapons & 2 War Maps

...You can find a list with all used songs at the spawn :)

In this mode of a little bit particular game, it is necessary to fire at all targets before opposite team. More we move, more weapons are specify, but targets are more difficult to touch. At the beginning, it is necessary to wait 30 seconds before the mini-game begins. You should not return behind, at the risk of losing his weapon and not to waste time too much, he is preferable to change weapon only at 0 bullet. The team who will have fire at all targets before the other one, will be teleported in the camp of the winners and the others in losers' camp. The camp of the winners will have advantages not unimportant for the final encounter. 

P.S.: legs up are forbidden. If you put the map on a public or private server, put : es_load snoblock 1 in parameters of the server to make cross the players between them.

V1

Inspired by the tetris game, the map takes place on a series of platforms that the CTs must climb in order to win. 2 Ts control the dropping of tetrominoes and must prevent the CTs from completing their goal.

CTs are armed with shotguns to destroy blocks that are in the way.

The point of this map is to avoid the falling boxes, which are formed as the original tetris boxes. In the middle of the zone, weapons fall down from the heaven. These will give you an advantage against your opponents, because everybody spawn with nothing but a knife. But it isn't easy to get these - you get them with your life as effort.
The map is created by "Ritter", "Yuggi:D" and "twistedVoid", who's name is abbreviated to "tV" on the map's credits wall.

The map from the original Counter-Strike Source version creator.
This map is based off another map called zm_actualtetris by Charles445.
HOW TO PLAY
Terrorist:
Create blocks to prevent the Counter-Terrorists from reaching the the end.
Counter-Terrorists:
Destroy all the blocks that are in your way and reach the end.
CHANGES
This version finally fixes the dreaded button disappearing bug. Other changes include:
Terrorist spawns changed from two to one.
A new special button for the Terrorist.
Map optimizations.
Textures changed.
Maximum spawns from 64 to 32.
INFORMATION
mg_tetris_revolution_b1ot is a "One-Team" version of mg_tetris_revolution.
As such, only one team can be the blockmaker(the Terrorist) and only one team the runners(Counter-Terrorists).
Although i will also develop a "Two-Team" version of this map,
which will include both Counter-Terrorists and Terrorists as
blockmakers and runners and also some other minor features.
-----
This is not the final version of this map.

I'm currently looking for suggestions. Whether it be suggestions for an additional "challenge", or an additional "level" (end game battle scenario). With challenge suggestions please suggest a theme (fire, water etc), a mode (bhop, surf etc), and a perk for end game that I could implement to go with it. I'm also looking for feedback on the current levels and whether they should be harder/easier. I realize most of them are relatively hard, I WANT this map to be a challenge (but not so hard that everyone rages and rtv's because they couldn't beat any of the challenges).

Info:
[Challenges]
Creation: Competition based. Right click to spawn a block under you, and try to be the first person to reach the portal (16 random spawnpoints, look around for a blue glow and head towards it). Left click to push whoever is in your direct LOS. (You can push enemies off their block, or coordinate with a teammate and push them closer to the portal). 45 second cooldown on the "pusher" after 3 uses.

Completing it lets you choose which "level" you play, and what guns are allowed for the fight.

*If nobody completes creation a random level and a random gun will be chosen*

Air: Strafe to the bottom. Use water blocks to get to the ending platform.

Completing it gives you lower gravity.

Earth: Climb to the top.

Completing it gives you 140 HP.

Electricity: Surf to the end. There are 3 surf ramps and 1 bhop platform that are faded out. For these, use the "action/use" key when near to "enable" them for 5 seconds. They will become solid, and surfable/hoppable during those 5 seconds before reverting back to being insolid.

Completing it gives you slightly increased movement speed.

Fire: Bhop on the floating rocks to get to the other side.

Completing it gives you a knife with a flamethrower perk of sorts. "Use/action" key activates a line of fire in front of you with 10 second cooldown.

Water: Slide to the end of the river, and go over the waterfall. As you're falling avoid hitting the rocks.

Completing it gives you slight health regeneration (up to a max of 100, even if originally you had 140HP from completing earth).


[Levels]
Arena-Fast paced, close quarters combat great for knife fights/awp battles.

cs deagle- Remade version of an old map: cs deagle. As the name implies, great for deagle fights, but works quite well for all gun scenarios.

Outdoor-Reasonable sized, fairly open outdoor level. Well rounded for most gun scenarios.

Contact me:
My steamname is "allsix". However there is a good chance I will decline if I don't know who it is.
I will probably check these comments for the first little while, but afterwards I will not.
The best way to contact me is to quickly create a forum account on http://www.steamgamers.com and message me: http://www.steamgamers.com/forum/private.php?do=newpm&u=4458

It's the only thing I regularly check.

-----------------------
I plan on updating "air" slightly. Making it better looking and possibly editing it's play.

I'm looking for suggestions on more "levels" especially, but also for more "challenges".

Because my vmf corrupted near the end I'm going to promote a program I used to fix it.

Made my vmf operable, but screwed a number my I/O's. An operable vmf with some I/O's that need fixing is better than an inoperable vmf with perfect I/O's though ;)

Download: http://rvanhoorn.ruhosting.nl/files/vmffixer.zip

NEW VERSION: http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/153244




This map is in beta. I haven't publicly tested it (yet). I've gone through it a number of times and fixed what I believe to be most/all of the bugs *hopefully* however near the end of development my vmf corrupted and I had to fix it which bugged a lot of my I/O. I'm pretty sure I fixed them all, but if I haven't please let me know of any/all bugs you find. I haven't tested with more than 2 people, so there may be bugs that only occur on a larger playerscale.

Install Instructions:

1. Download the map

2. Extract the map file and insert it to the following directory:

64 Bit: Program Files(x86)/Steam/steamapps/[steam name]/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps

32 Bit: Programs Files/Steam/steamapps/[steam name]/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps

![http://i.imgur.com/84YIG65.png](http://i.imgur.com/84YIG65.png "")

Instead of the old boring multigames where there is equal amount of CT and T. This map changes that overused, repetitive style of game. Although this map is purely experimental, but it is guaranteed fun if played properly.

![http://i.imgur.com/J3Mzgxl.png](http://i.imgur.com/J3Mzgxl.png "")

This minigame used the idea where T, only consist of 3 players are a superior team that gained a large advantages over CT,
which could consist up to 48 players. While the objective of each minigames varies, Red has one main aim, to kill all CT.
CT has to prevents that from happening by completing a specific type of objective with the help of their teammates.

There are NINE different minigames that can be chosen and THREE different music that perfectly enchance the ambience of the map.
The minigames are chosen by T and in each minigames, T will ALWAYS have different objective than CT and they both are required to
do different things.

Minigame List:

- Speed Run
- Death Run
- Tower Run
- Deagle vs Knife
- Shotgun vs Deagle
- M4a1 vs Deagle
- Hide and Seek
- Fort
- Grenade

Unreleased Minigame:

- Nemesis
- Juggernaught


Several Tips:
=============

- Teamworking is compulsory for CT to win the game.
- T must use some skills and experience depending on the minigame chosen to defeat CT.
- T must use the upper advantages to successfully defeat CT.


![http://i.imgur.com/Nw9rfDm.png](http://i.imgur.com/Nw9rfDm.png "")

- 3 T spawn, 48 CT spawn.
- Nine different fully functional multigames. Special Darkergaming's map will have ELEVEN.
- Three different music to choose from.
- Simple and elegant map design, uses 3 uniform colors throughout the map.
- Ingame brief text and instruction.
- Afk prevention system. Auto killing afk players.
- Trigger_hurt in minigames that will be activated if the round takes a long time, killing only CT.
- Some grenades with trails.

- Maximum possible entities at a time = 750.
- Maximum possible entities + 50 players at a time = 1250.
- 32MB including all the required files.

![http://i.imgur.com/C9PDael.png](http://i.imgur.com/C9PDael.png "")

NOBLOCK
======= 
Noblock is required for this minigame to work properly. Otherwise players are just going to stuck on each other! It is recommended to get an Auto-swap team plugin which enables more chance for other players to play as T.

![http://i.imgur.com/rnqtRgC.png](http://i.imgur.com/rnqtRgC.png "")

Tekelaxii - Map Design, Map creator.
KarateKaefer - Amazing Skybox.
Darkergaming - Support.

The Chain Gang of 1974 - SLEEPWALKING
Trailerhead - IMPERITUM
30 Seconds to Mars - THE KILL (BURY ME)

INSTALLATION:
=============

- Put it in your cstrike/maps folder.
- If its steam, then put it in 
C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps
  or similar directories.

IMPORTANT:
==========

If you wanted to report a bug or found any problem, PLEASE, post it here. It would be very appreciative and will help me alot.
I also wanted to make a fair ANALYSIS of the balance of the map. Again, post it here on what you think. PLEASE. Thanks.

Update Log:
===========

11/24/2013: Map release. [v1.0]
11/25/2013: [v1.1] 
- Added env_fade
- Remove many lightnings, file size decreased by 2MB.
- Remove many point_spotlight, entity amount decreased.
- Added a few things.
- Few entities is fixed and should now work properly.
- Added a buyzone in Fort for T use.

How to use the tank:
Placed on top of the tank and give the "E" and entering the driving mode (A,S,W,D) in order to leave return to give the "E" if you are in mode shot will not leave you.
Inside the driving mode of the tank with the right button of mouse we go into shooting mode (A,W,S,D) with the left mouse button to shoot and to return so driving right mouse button.

This is a a somewhat-basic jumping mini game map. Spawns 24. Includes Bomb Target. Point of the game is to race through the map by jumping on the platforms in order to get to the knives and guns. Fun for 10-15 minutes. Good for fast map changing mini game servers.

Francais :

Description :
Vous commencez au debut sans aucune armes (le cut)
Votre objectif principale et de trouver des armes caché dans la map pour sela il vous faudra activer des bouttons atteindre des endroits cachés...
ensuite au bout de 5min vous etes teleporter dans une arene et vous devrez vous battre avec les armes que vous aurez trouvez...

c'est une map fun qui se jou avec beaucoup de joueurs, mais qui devient moins amusante lorsque l'on connais tout les emplacements des armes.

English :

Description :
You begin without any weapons
You have to find hidden weapons in this map by pressing buttons in some places
After 5 minutes you will be teleported inside an arena and you can fight with weapons you found

That's a funny map with a lot of people, but not really interesting when you know the secret places.

You are a contestant with your other companions, you must avoid all of the traps set up by count takeshi and arrive at the final showdown to fight off the incoming enemies

this is my first map ever created so any improvements or suggestments are welcome, as long as they come with a tutorial (if the suggested thing is difficult/advanced)

Hosts 32 players.

UPDATE;
a bug showing up at T-Spawn got fixed, so now there are three Ts spread over the rooms.

----------------------

About the Map: 
The idea of this map came from a TV-Show called Takeshi's castle. There the contestants have to pass several challenges to get to the final battle against Takeshi. I chose one of them and made it playable in CS:S, of course with a few modifications.
Here is how it works:
There are 27 CTs and 4 Ts in total. The CTs have to get through the rooms (each with 4 non-solid doors) to the Teleporter. They've got no weapons, not even knifes. The three Terrorists who are spread over the 36 rooms got a p90 (or USP) to stop the CTs from getting to the teleporter. The CTs can fall into the water at the left and right sides which teleports them to jail, where they die by fire. The Terrorists can't fall into water plus they can't get to the Teleporter. This means, if a CT reaches the Teleport-Area there is no way to kill him. 
Let's assume that a CT reaches the Teleporter: Then the CT gets teleported to the top of the map where also  the jail is and he gets a weapon. Automatically the Terrorists get teleported to a smaller jail where they are quite incapable of defending theirselves. Now the CT can take revenge for his killed teammates. :). Btw.: You probably wonder where the fourth T is. Well, he is near the jail and can activate the fire in it, he can close 4 doors manually plus he can tell the Ts below where the CTs walk.

Compendium:
The mission: CTs --> rooms --> teleporter --> kill the terrorists
How can the CTs be detained? Fall into water --> Jail |or| Get killed by the three terrorists |or| The 4th terrorist closes 3 doors so the CTs have to take a detour rather than going straight through.

Features:
- for up to 31 players
- Custom Textures
- goes best with 'NoBlock'

Wipeout's SWEEPER now in CSS! :D That explain's everything, i guess :) After 100 Seconds knife's and nades spawn :) There is a secret button, wich plays music. Find it :P

MG SWAG MULTIGAMES V2_1

MAP INFO

A revised version of mg_swag_multigames with 6 new levels added. A multigame level with 19 maps to choose from. This is a 'sister' map to mg_YOLO_multigames, however they are not the same, this map has 19 new levels. NEW LEVELS Smoke Battle 50HP Knife Killer Balls Explosive Balls Tunnel Vision 1 v 1 Deagle Football (1HP or 100HP) Airdrop Knife Survival Portal Slide Slide Corridor Range Pistols (Headshot only now) Skeet VIP Elevator Shootout Osamas Last Stand (Base level built by Fletch) Map Notes: - Fall damage is only disabled in spawn, portal slide, smokebattle & airdrop. It will let the players know this via a screen overlay, everyother map will have fall damage enabled. - Once the map chooser has been selected a armour + 15HP boost will be circling around the spawn, if you can reach this you will be given a HP boost and kevlar. - VIP: Both teams have two VIP's each, if they both die then the team will be killed. Protect you're VIPs or go on the offensive and kill the enemies VIPs before they kill yours.

Change Log

v1 First version of map released. v2 A few bug fixes Slide & Portal Slide changed slightly Pistols level is now headshot only 6 New Levels (See above) 2D climber level removed New Music v2_1 Fixed Entity Count Crash

MG SWAG MULTIGAMESTHIS IS THE OLDER V1 VERSION OF THE MAP - YOU CAN GET THE LATEST V2_1 AT THE LINK BELOW

mg SWAG multigames V2-1

mg SWAG multigames V2-1

MG SWAG MULTIGAMES

MAP INFO

A multigame level with 14 maps to choose from. This is a 'sister' map to mg_YOLO_multigames, however they are not the same, this map has 14 new levels. - Football (1HP or 100HP) - Airdrop - Knife - Survival - Portal Slide - Slide - Corridor - 2D Climber - Range - Pistols - Skeet - VIP - Elevator Shootout - Osamas Last Stand (Base level built by Fletch) Map Notes: - Fall damage is only disabled in spawn, portal slide, 2D climber & airdrop. It will let the players know this via a screen overlay, everyother map will have fall damage enabled. - Once the map chooser has been selected a armour + 15HP boost will be circling around the spawn, if you can reach this you will be given a HP boost and kevlar. - VIP: Both teams have two VIP's each, if they both die then the team will be killed. Protect you're VIPs or go on the offensive and kill the enemies VIPs before they kill yours.

Change Log

v1 First version of map released.
This is the first version of the texture survive map and there will be up a new version soon with new future and so on. be updated for _v2

Sorry for the so many trashed posts. FPSB is giving me some troubles uploading and editing my uploaded maps :(.
Update 1-5-09 Bug fix: - Fixed a bug that caused the damage field not to reset when the red button was pressed. Extra: - Added a new event.
Update 30-4-09 Bug fixes: - Fixed a bug that would cause the red buttons not to function when pressed to early - The wall in the middle will now disappear when 6 (instead of 10) rounds have been played. Additional info: - Added some moving obstacles to the map.
It goes like this: There are 5 events that can randomly happen. Once the first event has ended, the next will start. This will keep happening. If the players can survive 6 events, the events will stop happening, the walls in the middle will disappear, and players will be able to pick up a deagle with 7 bullets or just go in with nothing but a knife. The last team standing wins. If you find any bugs, please let me know

Note that this is a beta version. When I tested it, it functioned correctly. If you do find any bugs, however, please report them to me! Also, any suggestions for improvement are very much appreciated!
Changes in beta 2 - Spikes will not go underground at the start of each round. Instead, they will start underground. - Spawns have been placed closer to the ground, hopefully to prevent lag at the start of the round. - Some additional decorative and tactical objects have been added. - During find&destroy the crates, if only one team manages to destroy the crate, that team won't die. - The trigger_push fields on top of the crates now have the correct speed of push value.
The terrorists and the counter-terrorists spawn on different sides of a glass wall. They can see eachother, but not hurt eachother. The idea of the map is to survive a number of events. Players will have nothing but a knife during these events. Each event has to be survived or completed within a given time. If you can't reach the goal of the event in time, you die. After a series of events (three events per round in this version of mg_survival), the glass wall in the middle will break, and the remaining players will have to fight to death. Changes planned for final release: - Give the trigger_pushes on top of the crates in the map the correct "speed of push" value. - Gonna make it so that if one team is able to destroy the crate, but the other isn't, only one team will die.

Each team starts out with knifes 1 player per team gets to be the summoner by walking into the S. He sits ontop the tower and presses buttons to call down meteroids on his side of the map to smush people. Each tower has a button for the other team to press that will destroy the enemies tower/summoner and weaken them down to 50 hp. Lots of weird tricks you can do in this map because of the meteroids shockwaves. Scouts will drop in the 2 towers after 2 minutes of gameplay to prevent running/camping.

plugins: XIX Tower Defense Plugin v2 Readme.txt

_sText:
mg_stone_of_destiny_td

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/o91UU4RHnsI" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

This is a new tower defense map for Css

Gameplay:

Your team has to defense the castle from the attacking units. The units walk a path around the castle before they enter the castle. You have to stop them from reaching the castle!
If 100 units reached the castle you loosed. There are several unit waves, after 3 waves you have to kill a boss before he kills you!

ABOUT MAP


-20 Lvls (Ground,Air,Tanks,Fast Units)                             
-5 Boss fights                                           
-Live Counter                                           
-Story with cutscenes                                     
-Over 1000 Units to kill                                      
-always balanced map (by Plugin)                                        


SHOP MENU

-Buy Weapons and Armor                   
-bet money                                   
-Buy Health                           
-shortening the munitions recovery                  
-Buy speed                                                                  


Plugin                                                   

Required plugin for XIX's Tower Defense v2 Map.
The plugin is only active if the map is loaded. The plugin will not affect the server performance.

Please remove any old map and/or plugin of XIX Tower Defense Source.

Special Thanks to The Holy Crew !!!

knife battle where you have to be chosen by a star (Max. slots 30)
-2 Stars, 1 per team
-1 Light tower in the center
-In the combat zone you can regenerate

This is a minigame map where players are tied to xwings or tifighters and shoot each other with lasers in a low grav space setting around the death star.

Thanks to [-B-] for his halo texture pack and quinity for his sky_space skybox.

If you upload the map to your server or use it as inspiration for another map please post here or pm me, thanks.

--- mg_stairways --- :: Description :: The Terrorist have to climb the tower. They can buy weapons. They spawn at bottom. The CT's spawn on top of the Tower, they aren't able to buy anything, they have to destroy the glass to the weaponchamber, otherwise, the terrorists will come and shoot them down. ;) This was made extra - because some Funny Guys would buy awp (there are 3 of it in the map, hidden) and shoot the terrorist down while they try to get up. In the Tower ther is a huge Stair, of course, good for the counterterrorist, to shoot, but T's can buy, don't forget.. ;) And if AWP isn't restricted... good luck, camper. :D In the next Version of the map, there will be an lift like in mg_tower to give an third way to climb the tower (or come safe down.. whatever)
RLS NOTES v1 - just that, what you see... ;)
